sql_queries.sql_query: SELECT local_authority_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS value, AVG(percentage) AS percentage FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group = 'White_British' AND date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY local_authority_name ORDER BY local_authority_name;
SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group = 'Asian Indian' AND date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY value DESC;

SELECT local_authority_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group = 'Black African' AND date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY local_authority_name ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT ethnic_group AS category, SUM(population_count) AS value, SUM(percentage) AS percentage FROM ethnicity_data WHERE area_name = '2021 Census' GROUP BY ethnic_group ORDER BY value DESC;

SELECT local_authority_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group = 'White_British' AND date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY local_authority_name ORDER BY value DESC;

SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS value, AVG(percentage) AS percentage FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group = 'Asian_Indian' AND date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY value DESC;

SELECT local_authority_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group = 'Black African' AND date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY local_authority_name ORDER BY value DESC;

SELECT local_authority_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group = 'White_British' AND date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY local_authority_name ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY value DESC;

SELECT local_authority_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN ethnic_group = 'Asian Indian' THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS value, AVG(SUM(CASE WHEN ethnic_group = 'Asian Indian' THEN population_count ELSE 0 END)) OVER () AS mean_value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY local_authority_name UNION ALL SELECT local_authority_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN ethnic_group = 'Black African' THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS value, AVG(SUM(CASE WHEN ethnic_group = 'Black African' THEN population_count ELSE 0 END)) OVER () AS mean_value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY local_authority_name ORDER BY category;

SELECT local_authority_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group = 'White_British' AND date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY local_authority_name ORDER BY category;

SELECT ethnic_group AS category, SUM(population_count) AS value, AVG(percentage) AS percentage FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group IN ('White_British', 'Asian_Indian', 'Black_African') AND area_name = '2021 Census' GROUP BY ethnic_group ORDER BY ethnic_group;

SELECT local_authority_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS value, AVG(SUM(population_count)) OVER () AS mean_value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY local_authority_name ORDER BY local_authority_name;
SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group = 'Asian Indian' AND date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY value DESC;

SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS value, AVG(percentage) AS percentage FROM ethnicity_data WHERE ethnic_group = 'Black African' AND date = '2021-01-01' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY value DESC;
